dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: I still have some time... to finish smoking this L.C.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Look at those idiots busily prancing about... time to sleep. ... Didn't you know? Hares are nocturnal.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg:
Last chance today to smoke a cig. Won't get the time later.
It's best to keep the night air crisp, unless we're looking to summon the beasts really drenched in shadows.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: The moon waxes. Time to hop into another bloodbath... heh, how exciting. I wonder what wonderful streaks of blood I'll get to admire today.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg:
Only dense idiots compare us to the Rabbits of R Corp.
We share the same roots but have grazed on different grass.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: ... Neither Mao nor Heishou can represent who I am; you will address me as Ryōshū, lord.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: The hares are dullards who know nothing about art, but I do like how they don't waste their breath on irrelevant details. Besides, no one chews me out as long as I follow orders.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
The glyphs on this weapon aren't there just for show. They're first-rate Q Corp. seals.
But it could never measure up to my sword. ... Nothing can.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: A beast that shared a meal yesterday is leashed and gagged by a political foe today; the lord to whom I pledged my loyalty today becomes prey to be mauled tomorrow. But it's just another day for us.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: As the old saying goes, don't trust the beasts that are black of fur. Remember that, lord.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: How does it feel, as the teeth of a beast you once trusted sink deep into your neck? Explain it slowly, and in detail. I won't rush.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: You're late. But your wish is my command.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Time to hop.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Any more prey I should take care of?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Mao branch of the Heishou Pack, ready to hop.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Hah. Don't die just yet.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tch, wait...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Hmph, worthless. Die.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah... dammit. That... was... fun.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Just killing time.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: You're wasting the Heishou Pack's time on this?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: What a disappointing hunt. Spilled too much blood for this to be beautiful—we took too long... tsk.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Nice... Just look at how vibrant this place has become. Hope the next prey gives a good show, too.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: The hunter becomes the hunted... I don't hate a good paradox, but it is... unpleasant.
